adjectives.description: muttony (comparative more muttony, superlative most muttony)

entries.meaning: Like mutton; having a flavour of mutton.
examples: I confess to having felt a prejudice against sleeping in a bag, more especially a sheepskin bag, which would probably have a muttony odor; but it was pronounced to be the warmest and least cumbersome form of bedding we could have  […]
